normalized: and then――
after that, asagi had immediately received emergency surgery in kiryuu's lab.
it was a surgical operation to remove the danger of being manipulated by muroi――no, demonic specialist doctor furst.
kiryuu had revived by turning into a bug, but after that he had entered what he called “hibernation for the sake of regeneration” and was wholly unhelpful.
the surgery had been performed by murasaki and an obstetrician-gynecologist who had been summoned.
asagi had safely emerged from the operating room the following night.
as one would expect, asagi had a deep look of fatigue.
the surgery had spanned a long period of time.
above all, the fact that kousuke had been abducted because of her own stupid actions had put her in a temporary state of lethargy.
it seemed that sakura and murasaki couldn't find the words to say to asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: …h
asagi bit her lip.
kousuke had been manipulated by furst and turned into a flesh ball.
it was the same.
as kousuke's older brother, kyousuke.
as the only man asagi loved from the bottom of her heart.
as the man who, in spite of that, was manipulated by oboro and had to be killed by asagi's own hand.

name: asagi
normalized: （kyousuke… i'm sorry…）

name: asagi
normalized: （i was an idiot… being made love to by kou-kun, i was remembering you…）

name: asagi
normalized: （even though the one who killed you was me…）

name: asagi
normalized: （but… i won't let kou-kun end up like you…）

name: asagi
normalized: （i'll definitely save… your little brother…）

name: sakura
normalized: onee-chan, is, uh… your body okay?

name: asagi
normalized: there's no problem.
the surgery was a success.

name: murasaki
normalized: b, but, asagi-sama…
murasaki hesitated to speak.
they had removed the cause of being manipulated by furst.
basically, it was something like that.

name: asagi
normalized: you two don't need to worry.

name: murasaki
normalized: o, okay…
the pair cast their eyes downward.
asagi was also silent for a short while.
however, her face immediately turned back to that of the taimanin commanding officer, and she spoke.

name: asagi
normalized: did you discover anything while i was sleeping?
sakura, how about the means of their invasion?

name: sakura
normalized: sorry.
we still don't know.
there was no reaction from the intruder-sensing barrier, and the surveillance team didn't notice it at all.
sakura promptly answered, seeming to have switched emotions.

name: asagi
normalized: i see.
looks like they didn't take those guys seriously.
for them to have penetrated here with ease…

name: sakura
normalized: really!
it's a little unbelievable.
to stealthily sneak into gosha village would be difficult if i used the “shadow escape technique”, and yet…
murasaki agreed with sakura, who expressed a look of astonishment.

name: murasaki
normalized: really.
asagi-sama, i reviewed muroi's data, but there weren't any suspicious points.
it was completely blank.

name: asagi
normalized: that means he was installed as the school's public health doctor through the normal procedures, doesn't it?

name: murasaki
normalized: yes.
at present, even whether muroi was furst from the beginning, or he changed places with the real muroi somewhere, is unknown.

name: murasaki
normalized: even kiryuu says he didn't notice until furst revealed his true identity.
well, since it's what that guy says, it can't be trusted, but…

name: asagi
normalized: that's right.
kiryuu, what kind of condition is he in now?

name: sakura
normalized: he's turned into a crushed insect or something.

name: murasaki
normalized: he says it will take many months in hibernation to revive.

name: sakura
normalized: kiryuu-chin is retiring for a little while?
when your opponent is something gross like a demonic specialist doctor, it helps to have someone equally gross, and yet…

name: murasaki
normalized: that guy is useless at crucial times.
murasaki said, sounding annoyed.

name: asagi
normalized: well, it seems like we have no choice but to let kiryuu sleep for a little while.

name: asagi
normalized: first of all, an investigation to determine how those guys penetrated the village.
at the same time, we plan a review of the surveillance system.
okay?
asagi said decisively.
she hadn't spoken about kousuke at this stage.
she would not aim to rescue him blindly, but to act appropriately as the leader of the taimanin.
even if she suppressed her own feelings.
there was no doubt in asagi's eyes.

name: murasaki
normalized: yes, asagi-sama!

name: sakura
normalized: roger, onee-chan!
probably having sensed asagi's determination, murasaki and sakura nodded forcefully.

name: kousuke
normalized: （this place is…）
his consciousness, which had dissolved into darkness, revived slightly.

name: kousuke
normalized: （that's right… i…）
he vaguely remembered.
that he had been turned into a flesh ball.
that, because of that, asagi had been placed in a predicament.

name: kousuke
normalized: （asagi-san… i…）
his body wouldn't move.
well, there was no feeling of his extremities per se.
thinking was a hassle.
it was natural.
he was now just a flesh ball.
he wasn't meant to be able to form normal thoughts.

name: kousuke
normalized: （i wonder where this place is?
he thought, incoherently.
scenery he was not familiar with spread out.
it seemed like even flesh balls could “see”.
the figures of people were visible in the opposite direction.
four people.
furst, ingrid, oboro, and black.
somehow, he knew that.

name: oboro
normalized: i, i am very sorry.
w, we fell just short of succeeding…
oboro, who was kneeling, hung her head deeply.
her voice was shaking.

name: black
normalized: furst, it's unlike you to waste my time and screw up at the end.
black called out to furst, who was similarly kneeling at oboro's side.

name: furst
normalized: i have failed.
that meat ball put up an unforeseen resistance.
furst's stomach shook as he answered.
unlike oboro, his face when reporting the failure of the mission was haughtiness itself.

name: black
normalized: sawaki kousuke.
was he the brother of asagi's fiance, sawaki kyousuke?
black said, like he was groping around for a memory.

name: furst
normalized: indeed.
i chose a flesh ball because he was an incompetent without a taimanin power, but it looks like he was not as incompetent as his older brother.
seriously…

name: ingrid
normalized: if it can't control the likes of a little boy, your hellish medical technology doesn't amount to much.

name: furst
normalized: kuh…?!
ingrid ignored furst's indignant expression and stepped forward towards black.

name: ingrid
normalized: black-sama.
next time, i will capture asagi by this sword.
give me the order.
oboro and furst cannot be relied upon anymore.

name: oboro
normalized: what did you say?!
say that again!
oboro raised her voice and scowled at ingrid.
ingrid made cold eyes.

name: ingrid
normalized: i only stated the truth.
ingrid scoffed at oboro, without even trying to hide her disdain.

name: oboro
normalized: kuh… you bitch…
oboro shook with humiliation.
however, because―on top of having made a mistake on the mission―she had been rescued by ingrid, she couldn't say anything back.

name: black
normalized: ingrid.
leave it at that.

name: ingrid
normalized: but, black-sama――
black quickly interrupted ingrid, who was about to say something again, with his hand.

name: black
normalized: this is also within expectations.
having captured asagi's family member will prove useful sooner or later.
saying so, he grinned.

name: ingrid
normalized: yes…
ingrid went silent and didn't say anything more.
however, the fact that she harboured displeasure about his treatment of oboro was obvious to anyone's eyes.
oboro raised her face towards black, and spoke.

name: oboro
normalized: black-sama, give this oboro a second chance.
please give me the task of capturing asagi once more.

name: oboro
normalized: please, black-sama!
she kowtowed, and petitioned black repeatedly.

name: black
normalized: wait a while, oboro.
black coldly refused.
oboro bit her lip.

name: ingrid
normalized: pfft.
a scornful smile arose to ingrid's cheeks.
and then, not concerned at all about the sparks between those female colleagues, black gave the three of them his next order.

name: black
normalized: furst.
i will entrust asagi's capture to you.
also, you will assist me with my plan.

name: furst
normalized: i understand.

name: black
normalized: ingrid.
you know that american nomad branches are being attacked one after another, yes?

name: black
normalized: it seems there is a new assassin aiming at me.
go to america at once, discover that person, and obliterate them.

name: ingrid
normalized: as you wish.

name: black
normalized: oboro.
this is intelligence from the state department of the american federation, which backs nomad.

name: black
normalized: an agency of the american department of defense is backing the 『steel taimanin』, who repeatedly attacks the japanese nomad branches.

name: black
normalized: investigate the hideout of this bitch, this 『steel taimanin』, and obliterate it.

name: oboro
normalized: …i understand.
i will do it.
this time, without fail.
black gave out orders in quick succession, and disappeared from that place.
furst, without disturbing his cool demeanour,
ingrid, completely stifling her personal feelings,
oboro, with a face full of mortification, had all received their respective commands.

name: ingrid
normalized: 『next time, without fail』, huh?
you will fail the next one, oboro.

name: oboro
normalized: ingriid!

name: ingrid
normalized: if you have the time to make the blood rise to your head, how about going to kill that 『steel taimanin』 right away?
they're a small fry, like you.
completely ignoring the enraged oboro, ingrid disappeared again with a derisive smile.

name: oboro
normalized: you shitty womaann!

name: oboro
normalized: getting carried away, hiding behind black-sama's favour!
someday, i'll kill you!
i'll absolutely kill you!
ingrid!
oboro's body was shaking in humiliation from the hated ingrid.
it was like her hatred took shape and became visible.

name: furst
normalized: definitely.
she is a little too cocky, isn't she?
ingrid, who reeks of a bitch, is not worthy of a great emperor.
furst nodded at oboro's words.

name: oboro
normalized: yeah, that's right.
i agree.
the fact that a whore who makes such a loyal face is by black-sama's side is wrong!
shit, shit woman!

name: furst
normalized: oboro.
i believe my mission is to create an environment befitting an emperor, for black-sama's sake.
for that purpose, i have a brilliant idea.
will you listen to it?

name: oboro
normalized: what?
let's hear it.
if it's to remove that irritating shitty woman, i won't hold back!
furst began talking like he was intoxicated, and oboro also expressed a wicked smile again.

name: furst
normalized: thank you.
however, before that――

name: oboro
normalized: what's wrong?

name: furst
normalized: it seems there's a nuisance…
furst grinned, and picked up kousuke's flesh ball.

name: furst
normalized: it's remarkable that your consciousness still remains, kousuke-kun.

name: furst
normalized: furthermore, peeping on us is a shameless, pathetic act truly becoming of you.

name: oboro
normalized: you're the younger brother of asagi's lover, who i once turned into my plaything?
kukuu, you brothers are both pathetic.
seeming to have remembered the incident from 10 years ago, a sneer arose on oboro's face.

name: furst
normalized: it's not like he was such an idiot.
he's like scum, but he raped asagi, his foster parent, without hesitation and got her pregnant.

name: oboro
normalized: heh, what hopeless scum.
i don't dislike you, boy!

name: furst
normalized: you got to be praised by a woman at the end, kousuke-kun.
now, i'll let you enjoy it.
you can sleep for eternity.
furst poured the power of darkness into the flesh ball.
kousuke had no way to defy it.
he had always been powerless.
the consciousness of kousuke, who had become a flesh ball, was swallowed deeply, deeply, into the depths of the gloomy darkness.
